name: RetroX
description:
Evaluation Link: https://forms.gle/AR87Fo72TPkKpwEc7

You are a scientist working on the Elixir of life, a formula for immortality. One day, you woke up at a mysterious place. What in the world just happened here? Where are the others? Surprised to find nothing but your missing wife’s personal info, You are put into the role of a man known as Mozez, who needs to survive from the dangers that lurk within. What is going on? How far can you bare these mysteries only with some clues to find out the truth? Figure you way out!
